text: Living well is the best revenge.
author: George Herbert

text: If a man does his best, what else is there?
author: George S. Patton

text: Clever men are good, but they are not the best.
author: Thomas Carlyle

text: It was the best of times, it was the worst of times.
author: Charles Dickens

text: I always prefer to believe the best of everybody, it saves so much trouble.
author: Rudyard Kipling
